item.title: #en @ 1451647665008173063
item.description: @RWMaloneMD Opendata, Opensciences, FAIRdata and datasharing is only possible if the quality and integrity of the data is well guaranteed. Biggest danger for AI application is manipulated datasets.

Thanks to @360Giving you can view all grants we've made since 2012, plus a huge range of useful grantee insights.
Read more 💽 https://t.co/5PBhXGIPPn https://t.co/1s3Lylg9Yu

item.title: #fr @ 1451483043886157827
item.description:
Bonjour @decodeurs, @CheckNewsfr, @RevelateursFTV, @AfpFactuel...
La mairie de Paris affirme avoir planté 5750 arbres sur les talus du Périphérique en un an.
Or il n'y que 5089 arbres en tout et pour tout * (un peu moins qu'avant).
Curieux, non ?
* https://t.co/CKg0D9EVrx https://t.co/CJ06xWZF9O

item.title: #en @ 1451124917831798785
item.description:
ok I stumbled upon this website and I have to say.
its BEAUTIFUL. and it was done PRO BONO by open data developers. it's easy to understand, functional and represents the data well
you compare this with the RM70 million paid for the vaksincovid website.
https://t.co/jFKdAYUQsT

item.title: #en @ 1451121542881026052

item.title: #en @ 1451116379646607364
item.description: Because of my carefully tended twitter feed, 50% I see this morning is people comparing a handful of fares to show that Andy Burnham is ace and/or a prick. Because the data, the truth, the proof, is almost inaccessible, we're just playing with examples. In France, it's #opendata.

Een veel relevantere vraag is waar de stijging in sterfte nu vandaan komt!

item.title: #es @ 1451081572434731009
item.description:
Los accidentes con patinetes eléctricos en Madrid van al alza (imagino que correlado con su uso). Sobre todo, los tienen menores y veintañeros en barrios del centro y Carabanchel. En 2021 han ocasiado 1 muerto y 18 graves.
Hecho con @graphext + datos abiertos de Madrid https://t.co/QSJxRZihFq
